TEXT.English: In Colonial Times, European Powers struggled for supremacy in New World. This mod will allow you to feel a bit of that aspect of Colonization history. You will struggle against natives and European Colonies to establish the largest new nation world has ever seen.
TEXT.French: Dans les temps coloniaux, les puissances européens luttaient pour la suprématie dans le Nouveau Monde. Ce mod vous permet de ressentir quelques aspects de cette Histoire colonial, qui marquera à jamais l'Humanité. Vous combatterez vos rivaux européens et indigènes pour établir la plus grande Nation que le monde n'aura jamais connu.
TEXT.German: In den Zeiten der Kolonialisierung kämpften die Europäischen Mächte um die Seeherrschaft in der Neuen Welt. Diese Möglichkeiten habt Ihr auch. Kämpft gegen die Ureinwohner und die anderen Kolonialmächte, um die größte Nation in der Neuen Welt zu werden.
TEXT.Italian: In Colonial Times, European Powers struggled for supremacy in New World. This mod will allow you to feel a bit of that aspect of Colonization history. You will struggle against natives and European Colonies to establish the largest new nation world has ever seen.
TEXT.Spanish: In Colonial Times, European Powers struggled for supremacy in New World. This mod will allow you to feel a bit of that aspect of Colonization history. You will struggle against natives and European Colonies to establish the largest new nation world has ever seen.

TEXT.English: Start the Industrial Revolution (production rate per turn)
TEXT.French: Commencer la Révolution Industrielle (taux de production par tour)
TEXT.Italian: Start the Industrial Revolution (production rate per turn)
TEXT.Spanish: Start the Industrial Revolution (production rate per turn)

TEXT.French: Victoire aux points après limite de tours
